metadata.name: The Orbits of Asterogues
metadata.description:
[b]The Orbits of Asterogues[/b] introduces two brand new characters inspired by [i]Asterogues[/i]! Absorb projectiles, master orbital combat, and unleash devastating meteor storms. Includes unique interactions and full [b]EID[/b] support!
[h1]ğŸŒŒ Overview[/h1] Instead of shooting tears normally, these characters manipulate [b]orbital tears[/b] Using gravitational powers, they can absorb enemy projectiles and other hazards into orbit and return them back with deadly force.

[]Maintains a [b]perfectly stable orbit[/b]: absorbed projectiles stay with him indefinitely. []Can [b]control the orbit radius[/b] using the fire buttons. [/list]
